title: Room for rent -- 2bed/1bath house/Boyley Heights
posting_body: ['Looking for a roommate in Boyle Height.', 'It’s super close to DTLA (10 minutes), Art district, USC Medical Center, 5 minutes away from USC Law School.', 'Room is available now.', 'This will be a shared home in a 2 bedroom house with are 2 professional individuals (couple) one full time Hair Stylist and one Professional personal trainer.', 'The restroom is shared.', 'The kitchen includes a microwave, oven/stove, and fridge…', 'The living space is also shared which you can use at any time.', 'The ideal candidate would be quiet/artistic person who works full-time or is a student.', 'There is a credit check and background check along with proof of work.', 'The room is only intended for one person, no couples.', 'There is a washer and dryer on site.', 'Off Street parking.', 'Feel free to reach out if you have any questions via. text or email.', 'Thank you', 'Ready to move in now!']
